by_app_by_device.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'push_notification_subscription' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit([doc.pvt_user_id, doc.pvt_device_id, doc.pvt_app_name], {id: doc._id, app_name: doc.pvt_app_name, notification_type: doc.notification_type, notification_registration_id: doc.notification_registration_id, notification_preferences: doc.notification_preferences, user_id: doc.pvt_user_id, device_id: doc.pvt_device_id});}

by_device.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'push_notification_subscription' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_device_id, {id: doc._id, notification_type: doc.notification_type, notification_registration_id: doc.notification_registration_id, user_id: doc.pvt_user_id, device_id: doc.pvt_device_id});}

by_user.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'push_notification_subscription' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.pvt_user_id, doc);}

map: emit([doc.pvt_user_id, currentValue], { app_name: doc.pvt_app_name, notification_type: doc.notification_type, notification_registration_id: doc.notification_registration_id });
